document_title: G6PD deficiency: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content: G6PD enzyme is an enzyme whose full name is glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase. G6PD is an enzyme that helps red blood cell membranes stay intact. It is extremely necessary to catalyze reactions in red blood cells to help make red blood cell membranes stable against harmful agents.
subsection_title: thieu men g6pd.json. What is G6PD enzyme?
subsection_data:
thieu men g6pd.json. What is G6PD enzyme?
G6PD enzyme is an enzyme whose full name is glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase. G6PD is an enzyme that helps red blood cell membranes stay intact. It is extremely necessary to catalyze reactions in red blood cells to help make red blood cell membranes stable against harmful agents.
